surfit::lcm_simple Class Reference

law of conservation of mass for homogeneous formation (constants for formation permeability, thick and liquid viscosity) and stationary filtration.

#include <lcm_simple.h>

Data Fields

REAL permeability
 formation permeability (constant for all area)
REAL viscosity
 fluid viscosity (constant for all area)
REAL multiplier
 multiplier coefficient for Darcy law: speed = - permeability/viscosity*multiplier * grad(pressure)
